name: FPS Fast paced Shooter game (v.0.1 VERY WIP)
name_original: FPS Fast paced Shooter game (v.0.1 VERY WIP)
description: I am 13 years old and i am passionate about making games. This is a modified microgame from the unity game engine. i intend to add building mechanics to this FPS game (kind of like fortnite but a little different) if you want to follow the development of this game then visit my YouTube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqvhH4uzhbb_sjQSP-GHfpg
